rules.natural: Either grizzly bears have habitat in the protected forest or the Habitat Protection Act passes
If the conservation agency monitors wildlife, then should Congress fail to approve the budget, the conservation agency issues a public alert
If the conservation agency enforces restrictions, then the conservation agency establishes a protected zone
If the conservation agency documents species, then the conservation agency does not face a legal challenge
If the conservation agency partners with NGOs, then the conservation agency creates wildlife corridors
If the conservation agency launches an awareness campaign, then provided that the Habitat Protection Act does not pass, the conservation agency partners with NGOs
Either the conservation agency receives public support or the conservation agency launches an awareness campaign
If the conservation agency secures grants, then the conservation agency expands operations
Either the conservation agency secures grants or the conservation agency faces funding cuts
If the conservation agency faces funding cuts, then the conservation agency does not receive public support
If the conservation agency complies with the law, then the Habitat Protection Act passes
Either the conservation agency complies with the law or the conservation agency meets requirements
Either the conservation agency reduces efforts or if the conservation agency meets requirements, then the Habitat Protection Act passes
If the conservation agency faces criticism, then the conservation agency does not reduce efforts
Either the conservation agency maintains facilities or if the conservation agency meets requirements, then the Habitat Protection Act passes
If the protected forest maintains biodiversity, then the grizzly bear population is stable
If the conservation agency adapts its strategy, then when the conservation agency experiences a setback occurs, the conservation agency does not maintain facilities
If the conservation agency succeeds long-term, then the conservation agency adapts its strategy
Either the conservation agency conducts research or if the Habitat Protection Act does not pass, then the conservation agency receives funding
If Congress approves the budget, then the conservation agency does not conduct research

If it is not the case that grizzly bears having habitat in the protected forest leads to the protected forest maintaining biodiversity, then the conservation agency does not initiate an emergency survey

If it is not the case that either the conservation agency achieves targets or the Habitat Protection Act not passing leads to the conservation agency receiving funding, then the conservation agency receives recognition

If it is not the case that either the conservation agency achieves targets or the Habitat Protection Act not passing leads to the conservation agency receiving funding, then the conservation agency does not receive recognition

If it is not the case that the failure of grizzly bears having habitat in the protected forest to lead to the protected forest maintaining biodiversity results in the conservation agency initiating an emergency survey, then the conservation agency implements a breeding program
If it is not the case that the Habitat Protection Act not passing leads to the conservation agency enforcing restrictions, then the conservation agency faces a legal challenge
If the Habitat Protection Act does not pass, then the conservation agency does not establish a protected zone

facts.natural: The conservation agency experiences a setback
The conservation agency does not create wildlife corridors
The conservation agency does not expand operations
The grizzly bear population is not stable
The conservation agency does not achieve targets
The conservation agency does not implement a breeding program
The conservation agency does not receive funding
The conservation agency does not issue a public alert
